messages.title: Karma in Crisis
messages.subTitle: Greater pleasure from next coffee by supporting your favorite café!
messages.para1: Get more enjoyment from your next coffee in isolation! How? By donating the price of a coffee, or any amount you wish, to your favorite café. How? All you need is the café's email address which you'll normally find on their website and follow these PayPal instructions! Enjoy good karma with your next coffee!
messages.para2: Small businesses are badly impacted by the corona crisis and struggling to survive. In most countries cafés and restaurants must stay closed for the coming weeks. In the Netherlands this is impacting 400,000 workers. We can help our favorite cafés survive with a small gesture that also makes our next coffee in isolation more enjoyable!
messages.para3: Research has proven that helping others makes us feel happier and reduces our stress and anxiety!
messages.para4: Do you have a favorite café or restaurant that you are hoping will survive this crisis? Perhaps even a café run by a friend? Well next you have a coffee at home because you cannot go out, why not donate what you'd normally have spent in a café to your favorite café?
messages.para5: How? PayPal makes this easy! All you need is the email address of your favorite café and you can make a donation of any amount using PayPal. More often than not you'll find the email address of your favorite café on their website.
messages.para6: Learn more about how PayPal works at How do I send a payment through PayPal?
messages.para7: And next time you have a coffee at home instead of in your favorite café, donate what you would normally spend to help your favorite café survive!
messages.para8: It will make you enjoy your home coffee more and make you happier!
messages.para9: By the way, you can support your favorite hairdresser, restaurant or any other business impacted by this crisis in this same way!
messages.para10: Please share this website, spread the word and support your favorite small businesses around the world.
